item.title: [ESAIP CTF] - Find the Matrix (500)
item.description: Author : voiv0de The ESAIP CTF was overall a pretty cool event. Usually I take care of the Reverse Engineering challenges but on this one I returned to my first love : Cryptanalysis. During the CTF, I managed to obtain two first bloods in this category ðŸ©¸. Today, I present to you : Find the Matrix. The flag was encrypted by this algorithm, find a way to reverse it to get the flag!
